A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie was entertaining but as one of the Star Wars franchise films\, it was disappointing.  Diversity for the sake of diversity was irritating.  Leia and the general are not convincing as military revel commanders.  They're like some liberal fantasy of what the universe would look like if they were in charge of the military.  Other plot holes are typical for blockbusters but this combined with the other Disneyfication elements make the franchise almost unwatchable.  Not as bad as what was done to Sat Trek Trek though in the latest movies and tv series.
